name: Care Bears: The Care Quests
overview: Welcome to the colorful land of "Care-a-lot", home of the fun and fuzzy Care Bears! The Care Bears are a group of adorable, furry friends who each have a special caring mission to help one another learn how to care. Choose your favorite Care Bear, and then set out on 12 different and exciting Care Quests through the beautiful landscapes of "Care-a-lot".
